channel.title: How do i get people to connect to my server?
channel.description: I have a 317 server. Its like that exion turmoil one. I have the client with me and everything and i can run it on my computer. The problem is how do i get my friends on it? Do they have to download the client and then edit the client.java file to my ip? and then could they run it? Please help ive been trieing to do this for weeks.

item.title: How do i get people to connect to my server?
item.dc:creator: @Delift3d Delift3d
item.description:
@Delift3d wrote:

i do have my router portforwarded and i do have no-ip. but wouldnt it just be easeir to add in my ip?
Also could i also do this .rar download to work with a 562? do the same principles apply with the 317 and the 562?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get people to connect to my server?

item.title: How do i get people to connect to my server?
item.dc:creator: @xxpkpurexx xxpkpurexx
item.description:
@xxpkpurexx wrote:

If you have a router portforward your router and open a port such as “5555” , go to no-ip.com and register a new server ip and post the ip in the client give your friends the new client and your done

Read full topic

item.source: How do i get people to connect to my server?

item.title: How do i get people to connect to my server?
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

Ok, Make a copy of your client that is connected to your source with the client.java already edited.
Compress it into a .rar file using winrar by right clicking the files and choosing “add to archive”
upload it on a file sharing website and give them the link for the download, it’s that simple.

heres a list of sites i suggest

http://megaupload.com

MediaFire

MediaFire

MediaFire is a simple to use free service that lets you put all your photos, documents, music, and video in a single place so you can access them anywhere and share them everywhere.


http://uppit.com

Hope this helps

Read full topic
